tool.name: SaQC
tool.description: quality control pipelines for environmental sensor data
tool.command: ln -s '$config' config.csv && #for $i, $d in enumerate($data) ln -s '$d' '${i}.csv' && #end for saqc -c config.csv #for $i, $d in enumerate($data) -d '${i}.csv' #end for -o output.csv
tool.help: This tool runs the SaQC quality control pipeline specified by a config file on the input data. Just upload your data and a config file, and the tool will run the SaQC pipeline on the data.
